summary: "Columbo" is a popular American TV crime show about a clever detective, Lieutenant Columbo, played by Peter Falk. It first aired in 1971 on NBC and later on ABC. Columbo solves murders by being super observant and asking clever questions, often catching the audience off guard. The show is unique because it starts with the crime and the criminal, and then Columbo figures out how to catch them. The characters are usually rich and powerful, and Columbo's humble and funny personality tricks them into confessing. The show is famous for its clever stories and has been watched in many countries.
title: Columbo
